name: Witchhammer
storyline:
Let me tell you a story about a girl called Clovelin...

Clovelin lived with her family in a small mountain village, at the foot of the Black Monastery.
Life changed for us when the black gate opened and the Inquisitor arrived in town.
The inquisitor said he wanted to “free us from the devil”. He said the devil was in all of us.
Clovelin was the first girl to die burning at the stake because she loved cards.

The Inquisitor knew that Clovelin was only his first victim, he knew that our village didn't have the power to stop him from killing people night after night. He knew that the Witch Hammer made him the most powerful.

But he did not know that Clovelin was coming for him.
summary:
Witchhammer is a Real-Time Roguelike Deckbuilding Game.
Play as Clovelin, a card reader who was convicted as a witch and made a deal with the devil to avenge her own death. With the powers of her magical tarot deck, you will battle the Inquisition and try to destroy their most powerful weapon: the Witchhammer.
To master our real time deckbuilding roguelike you will not only learn how to avoid your enemies attacks but also how to play your cards most efficiently.
After every wave of enemies you will improve your deck, making it more powerful and adapting it to your own playstyle.
